replies.body:
Where do you live? United States
What is your real name? I forgot it
Favourite food? Steak
Favourite drink? Lemonade
Favourite fruit? Mango
Favourite colour? Green
Favourite animal? Lion

How did you find Avicus? An old friend of mine (epicblocks6) brought me here. I actually played OCN before coming here but all my friends preferred playing here (MasterProX and others that never necame regulars) so I just kept playing here. I actually regret it because I'd like to have been part of competitive OCN since the beginning.

How did you start playing OCN? In the very beginning I saw one of TheCampingRusher's videos where he played Project Ares and to me the idea that I could alter the map in a multiplayer pvp gamemode was something new. I went back to OCN because the competitive scene caught my attention but sadly it's not what it was before. I also went there because Avicus got extremely boring.

Favourite OCN Map? Probably GD3, I like most CTW maps but my team doesn't play the gamemode at all and the new 5v5 style is trash.

Rate my lag, 1-100: 70, it gets difficult to fight you but at least you don't teleport severely.

Can I 1v1 you someday? Yeah just message me on skype

Why is toggle sprint not allowed on OCN?... The staff don't even know themselves but in the rules it says Better Sprinting isn't allowed but toggle sneak is and there is a sprint function in it so make of that what you will...

Opinions on me? You seem like a chill guy that speaks his mind. I can't tell much from just text because I've never spoken to you or been with you in a team or anything of the sort. I also feel like you have a lot of hidden potential as a competitive player.

replies.body:
Favourite Avicus map? Rendezvous CTW

Who is your best friend in Avicus? Well, MasterProX has been my friend way before we joined avicus and I know he's there for me and vice versa even though we don't really have private conversations but at the current moment I have to say it's Stroop.

Opinions on me? When you first started talking to me I thought you were going to be annoying but you're actually a friendly, calm guy that can have a conversation about anything. You're an overall good player and especially rusher. I respect you for saying that you know you're not as skilled as other more well known players and that you spend more time playing than them but it still takes skill to get that many objectives.

replies.body: You're probably the nicest, most humble and most chill guy I know. You always try to do the right thing and you stay calm when everything around you is falling apart. Your dedication toward helping the server and just people in general is amazing and I really respect you for that. I remember when I was new to the server I always wanted to be in your team because I knew we'd win because of you getting all the monuments. I'm glad there's people like you on this server and I'm glad I got to know you a little better.

replies.body: Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on me?

replies.body:
What was the most emotional experience you had on Avicus and in your life? In Avicus it'd have to be winning the second tournament with PPB, specifically the 2nd and 3rd matches against BC. In my life, I've had too many so I couldn't really decide and even if I did, it'd probably be too personal anyway.

Why do you like the most on Avicus? The competitive side of it.

What was the worst experience you had on here? The worst experience would have to be "winning" the first tournament due to the extreme amount of hate we got all because one person couldn't follow the rules.

Do you think you did good on your midterms? Yes, I did very good considering the minimal amount of effort I put in toward studying.

How would you describe the community? How the staff team? The overall community is decent from what I can tell, I'm not involved at all so I can't say much but the competitive side is a bit disappointing in terms of behavior and skill level. The higher-up staff team lacks sophistication in some areas in my opinion, the regular mods aren't bad, people blame them for a lot of things but they fail to realize they can't do much about it, overall they get their job done as far as I can tell.

Why do you like the most on Avicus? The competitive side of it.

What was the worst experience you had on here? The worst experience would have to be "winning" the first tournament due to the extreme amount of hate we got all because one person couldn't follow the rules.

Do you think you did good on your midterms? Yes, I did very good considering the minimal amount of effort I put in toward studying.

How would you describe the community? How the staff team? The overall community is decent from what I can tell, I'm not involved at all so I can't say much but the competitive side is a bit disappointing in terms of behavior and skill level. The higher-up staff team lacks sophistication in some areas in my opinion, the regular mods aren't bad, people blame them for a lot of things but they fail to realize they can't do much about it, overall they get their job done as far as I can tell.

Opinions on me? (Be honest, and I know I can be a bitch so it's okay)

Get me a really good solo monitor and look clean or use my 4 year old cheap 19" monitor as an overhead display and be productive but it'll look weird?

Go with red LEDs or white LEDs for my red/white/black setup theme? I could go white behind the desk and red behind the monitor or vice-versa.

Should I stop being a dork and ask these kind of questions in AMAs? (we all know the answer to that one)






what am i doing with my life (pls dont answer but answer so it will be funny wink wink *realizes answer is not good and realizes he talks too much and is annoying as fuck and is now crying*)

In all seriousness though, you're a pretty cool guy that is pretty damn good at MC and PCs. You helped me build my first PC and it works incredibly! Thanks c;.

replies.body:
Opinions on me? You're a nice guy that tries too hard sometimes. When you started learning about building computers you would try to help everyone that asked for a build or just advice and ended up giving them unbalanced or just bad builds and it got really annoying. I would assume you've gotten better now but I don't really know. You're also a bit too defensive when it comes to discussions about peripherals, remember that people can have different opinions and experiences. Other than that, you're a nice guy overall.

Get me a really good solo monitor and look clean or use my 4 year old cheap 19" monitor as an overhead display and be productive but it'll look weird? It's up to you, I know with my level of OCD I'd want to have it look as good as possible but only if I could afford a really nice setup (which I can't right now) but when I graduate and stuff I'll be sure to have a really good-looking one. I would go with the second monitor unless the rest of your setup looks really good.

Go with red LEDs or white LEDs for my red/white/black setup theme? I'd go with red but it's up to you.
 
Should I stop being a dork and ask these kind of questions in AMAs? We all know the answer to this one.






what am i doing with my life (pls dont answer but answer so it will be funny wink wink *realizes answer is not good and realizes he talks too much and is annoying as fuck and is now crying*) Nothing productive.

In all seriousness though, you're a pretty cool guy that is pretty damn good at MC and PCs. You helped me build my first PC and it works incredibly! Thanks c;. Glad you like it.

I would assume you've gotten better now but I don't really know. You're also a bit too defensive when it comes to discussions about peripherals, remember that people can have different opinions and experiences. Other than that, you're a nice guy overall.

Get me a really good solo monitor and look clean or use my 4 year old cheap 19" monitor as an overhead display and be productive but it'll look weird? It's up to you, I know with my level of OCD I'd want to have it look as good as possible but only if I could afford a really nice setup (which I can't right now) but when I graduate and stuff I'll be sure to have a really good-looking one. I would go with the second monitor unless the rest of your setup looks really good.

Go with red LEDs or white LEDs for my red/white/black setup theme? I'd go with red but it's up to you.
 
Should I stop being a dork and ask these kind of questions in AMAs? We all know the answer to this one.






what am i doing with my life (pls dont answer but answer so it will be funny wink wink *realizes answer is not good and realizes he talks too much and is annoying as fuck and is now crying*) Nothing productive.

In all seriousness though, you're a pretty cool guy that is pretty damn good at MC and PCs. You helped me build my first PC and it works incredibly! Thanks c;. Glad you like it.

Least favourite thing about playing scrims with me? You constantly hackusate and you repeat it several times throughout the match.
